metadata.dc:author: Alvarez de Trillo, Y
Estremadoyro Stagnaro, L
Gamero Tejada, D
Estremadoyro, O
metadata.dc:description: We present the study of 120 cases of gastric carcinoma, observed in the Hospital Regional Honorio Delgado from Arequipa Peru, in 2683 gastroscopies, with 4.5% of incidence. We offer date of age, sex, race, occupation, antecedents, social-economic conditions, clinics, diagnosis, pathologies aspects and mortality.
metadata.dc:title: Cáncer Gástrico en el Hospital Regional Honorio Delgado de Arequipa.
[Gastric cancer in the Honorio Delgado Regional Hospital in Arequipa].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
